title: Gears of War 3
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English, French. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  “Gears of War 3” is the spectacular conclusion to one of the most memorable and celebrated sagas in videogames. Developed by Epic Games exclusively for Xbox 360, “Gears of War 3” plunges players into a harrowing tale of hope, survival and brotherhood.  In “Gears of War 3,” players fight on as Marcus Fenix, the grizzled war hero and leader of Delta Squad. Eighteen months after the fall of the last human city, the war against the Locust rages on. Meanwhile, deep beneath the surface, a fearsome new threat is infecting the planet from within. With survivors scattered and civilization in ruins, time is running out for Marcus and his comrades as they fight to save the human race.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Armored Kantus Mask
childDownloads.description: The Armored Kantus Mask serves as an elegant accoutrement for any attire--guaranteed to be the talk of dinner parties, business meetings, or Locust onslaughts. "My, those sparks look sharp!" your friends or pathetic human victims will exclaim. "Grovel, meat!" you'll snarl in response.

childDownloads.title: Baird Tee
childDownloads.description: Fans of Baird know that he is the joke cracking member of Delta Squad.  That is not more apparent than in the saying on this tee, inspired by Baird.

childDownloads.description: It's big, it's heavy... it's portable cover! What's not to love? Equip your avatar with the menacing Boomshield.

childDownloads.title: Booster Map Pack
childDownloads.description: This required download to play on dedicated servers also adds five maps for public Versus play: two new--Bulletmarsh and Clocktower--and three previously only available for private matches (from Horde Command Pack)--Azura, Blood Drive, and Rustlung.

childDownloads.title: Brothers in Battle – Brothers to the End
childDownloads.description: Brothers To the End - Diego Sanchez and his UFC brethren train together to win together.

childDownloads.title: Brothers in Battle – Horde Heroics

childDownloads.title: Carmine Helmet
childDownloads.description: Outfit the helmet worn by Clayton Carmine, a COG soldier in Gears of War 3. The oldest of the Carmine clan, Clayton fights in memory of his brothers Anthony and Benjamin, who died fighting the Locust. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Clayton Carmine Armor
childDownloads.description: Outfit this armor to suit up as Clayton Carmine, a COG soldier in the upcoming Gears of War 3. Clayton, the oldest of the Carmine clan, fights in memory of his brothers Anthony and Benjamin, killed fighting the Locust in Gears of War and Gears of War 2. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
